description: This file defines a React functional component 'AppBar' that renders a top application bar with a title, optional sidebar toggle button, and a logout button if the user is authenticated. It imports React, a custom hook 'useAuth' for authentication state, a theme object 'COLORS', and associated CSS styles.

methods.name: AppBar({ onSidebarToggle })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the top app bar with optional sidebar toggle and logout button.
